General.Name: UV Germi SA
General.Description: UV Germi SA designs, manufactures, and sells ultraviolet devices for the treatment of, air, water, and surfaces in France. The company offers its products in the areas of drinking water, seawater, dechloramination, wastewater and industrial process water, private pool, legionella, germiserre, industrial clean water, livestock farming industries. It also provides after sales services, such as installations, online repairs, technical advice, diagnosis, spare parts, on-site intervention, and training on the use of the equipment. UV Germi SA was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Saint-Viance, France.
General.Address: ZAC de la Nau, Saint-Viance, France, 19240
